Glucorticoide.receptor.dynamics <- function(t,mRNAR, R,DR, DR.N,params){
  with(as.list(c(parms)),{
    dmRNAR <- ks.RM * (1 - (DR.N / (IC50.Rm + DR.N))) - kd.RM * mRNAR
    
    dR <- ks.R * mRNAR + Rf * kre * DR.N - kon * D * R - kd.R * R
    
    dDR <- kon * D * R - kT * DR
    
    dDR.N <- kT * DR - kre * DR.N
    
    return(list(c(dmRNAR, dR, dDR, dDR.N)))
  })
}

state <- c(mRNAR = 267, R = 4.74, DR = 0, DR.N = 0)

time <- seq(0, 48, by = 1)

parameters <- c(ks.RM = 2.90, IC50.Rm = 26.2, kd.RM = 0.612, ks.R = 3.22, Rf = 0.49, kre = 0.57, kon = 0.00329, kd.R = 0.0572, kT = 0.63, D = 20)

out <- ode(times = times, y = state, parms = parameters.increase, func = mRNA.dynamic, method = "euler")

out
